name: SCNSkinner
desc: An object that manages the relationship between skeletal animations and the nodes and geometries they animate.

items.name: init(baseGeometry: SCNGeometry?, bones: [SCNNode], boneInverseBindTransforms: [NSValue]?, boneWeights: SCNGeometrySource, boneIndices: SCNGeometrySource)
items.desc: Creates a skinner object with the specified visible geometry and skeleton information.

items.name: var baseGeometry: SCNGeometry?
items.desc: The geometry whose surface the skinner’s animation skeleton deforms.

items.name: var baseGeometryBindTransform: SCNMatrix4
items.desc: The coordinate transformation for the skinner’s geometry in its default state.

items.name: var skeleton: SCNNode?
items.desc: The root node of the skinner object’s animation skeleton.

items.name: var bones: [SCNNode]
items.desc: The control nodes of the animation skeleton.

items.name: var boneInverseBindTransforms: [NSValue]?
items.desc: The default transforms for the animation skeleton’s bone nodes.

items.name: var boneWeights: SCNGeometrySource
items.desc: The geometry source that defines the influence of each bone on the positions the geometry’s vertices.

items.name: var boneIndices: SCNGeometrySource
items.desc: The geometry source defining the mapping from bone indices in skeleton data to the skinner’s bones array.
